name: The Democracy Tug-of-War
description: The NCR's expansion into timeline-displaced Commonwealth territories threatens the Minutemen's grassroots democracy. Two visions of the future clash.

objectives.desc: Witness the NCR's arrival in Commonwealth territory.
Meet representatives from both the NCR and Minutemen.
Attend the tense diplomatic summit between factions.
Investigate sabotage attempts disrupting peace talks.
Choose which form of democracy will rule the Commonwealth.

ncr.argument: We have experience governing large territories. The Commonwealth needs structure, not militias.
ncr.offer: Protection, trade networks, legal system, taxes

minutemen.argument: We know this land. We protect it. We don't need outsiders telling us how to live.
minutemen.offer: Local autonomy, community defense, no taxes

support_ncr.desc: Support NCR annexation of the Commonwealth.

consequences.outcome: NCR flag flies over Commonwealth. Order imposed. Minutemen disband. Some become insurgents. Progress with a heavy hand.

support_minutemen.desc: Support Minutemen independence and repel the NCR.

consequences.outcome: Minutemen triumph. Commonwealth stays free. NCR retreats. But without structure, challenges remain.

broker_compromise.desc: Create a federation where both systems coexist.

consequences.outcome: Historic compromise. Commonwealth Federation formed. Local autonomy under NCR protection. Both sides win and lose.

chaos_option.desc: Sabotage both sides, letting raiders and Brotherhood fill the power vacuum.

consequences.outcome: You light the match. Both factions bleed. Raiders thrive. Brotherhood seizes tech. The wasteland stays wasteland.

regional_impact: Major - determines government structure of timeline-merged Commonwealth
notes: First major timeline collision quest. Player choice determines entire region's political future. Multiple follow-up questlines based on outcome.
